title: A Paralympic Winter Games Preview
description: The Paralympic Games start March 8th. In this episode, host Lauren Shehadi looks at how advances in technology have created better prosthetics, which have made it possible for more athletes to compete in the Paralympic Games.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Sports)
